content:
Hi ,
Sorry, I hope most of them aware of this : http://www.en13606.org/information.html
what are the relevent points for FHIR?
Thanks

13606 and a fork of 13606 (known as OpenEHR) are well known in the FHIR community. If you were to google on both terms I'm sure you would find some detailed comparisons. OpenEHR has its own channel on this forum, #openehr.
